contentrichtext.text: '''Pulldown''' may refer to: *[[Pulldown (casting)]], a type of casting defect *Pull-down resistor. See [[Pull-up resistor]] *[[Pull-down assay]], a biochemical protein extraction technique *Pull-down menu. See [[Menu (computing)]] ==Fitness== *[[Pulldown exercise]], a compound exercise designed to stress and develop the Latissimus dorsi. *A [[mark (Australian football)]] ==Media== *[[Negative pulldown]], the difference between 2-, 3-, and 4-perf movie camera frame movements *[[Pull-down curtain]] *[[Telecine]], the methods of 3:2 pulldown in video conversion {{Disambig}}
